name: I18x
body:
![](https://github.com/mamekudz/i18x/blob/master/clients/sources/javascript/logo.png?raw=true)
Welcome to i18x.
i18x is a XML like open source culture translation format. It's the smart way to create platform independend translations with grammatical, syntactic and metameric rules including flexible number-, unit- and calendar-formats and named placeholders support.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
